activities: Avis Budget Group handles personal information transferred from countries in the European Economic Area (EEA) and Switzerland to the United States that are collected or received in managing our Human Resources activities. For clarity, Avis Budget Group's Safe Harbor certification does not apply to the operations of Zipcar, a subsiary of Avis Budget Group, as Zipcar maintains a separate Safe Harbor certification for its operations.
corpofftitle1: EVP, General Counsel & Chief Compliance Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: HR data, off-line, on-line, manually processed data
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities
